price: Dios no oprime a las personas en absolutamente nada, sino que son las personas las que se oprimen a sí mismas.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَظۡلِمُ ٱلنَّاسَ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱلنَّاسَ أَنفُسَهُمۡ يَظۡلِمُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha lā yaẓlimu al-nāsa shayan walākinna al-nāsa anfusahum yaẓlimūna
